document.full_text: an iranian court has barred a vice president and ally of mahmoud ahmadinejad from holding office for "violations" in a previous job, the semi-official fars news agency said on saturday, in a blow to the president.
document.title: iran bans ahmadinejad ally from office: fars
lines_and_colors: an iranian court has barred a vice president and ally of mahmoud ahmadinejad from holding office for "violations" in a previous job, the semi-official fars news agency said on saturday, in a blow to the president.
